verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All of You, Is more than enough for newline All of Me newline For every thirst and need newline You satisy me with Your love newline and All I have in You newline Is more than enough.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are my supply newline My breath of life newline Still more awesome than I know newline You are my reward newline Worth living for newline Still more awesome than I know

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You're the sacrifice newline Of greatest price newline Still more awesome than I know newline You're my coming king newline You are everything newline Still more awesome than I know

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: More than all I want newline More than all I need newline You are more than enough for me newline More than all I know newline More than all I can say newline You are more than enough for me.
